A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Good flick. There were a few things I didn't like\, but overall it was very enjoyable. I was glad to see them take the franchise in a different direction.\n\n I've been a fan of the Star Wars extended universe since  the Timothy Zahn novels in the early 90s. It's safe to say that I'm a mega fan. But I get why Disney wanted to wipe that out so they could start fresh. Unfortunately\, many fans can't understand that which is the reason there is a vocal minority of people who hate this movie. But Star Wars needed to evolve. Heros don't stay heros forever.
